pull.title: Re-instate TARGET_OS=linux in configure.ac. Removed by 351abf9e035.
pull.body: Seems to have been removed erroneously. An error on linux manifests as "xcb" qt linking related.

events.message: Re-instate TARGET_OS=linux in configure.ac. Removed by 351abf9e035.

issue.title: Backport leveldb build integration to 0.12
issue.body:
This is a cherry-pick of a4625acb with minor conflict
resolution.

Conflicts:
    src/Makefile.am
# 

leveldb: integrate leveldb into our buildsystem

leveldb's buildsystem causes us a few problems:
- breaks out-of-tree builds
- forces flags used for some tools
- limits cross builds

Rather than continuing to add wrappers around it, simply integrate it into our
build.

issue.title: Prepare for LevelDB 1.22 update
issue.body:
Cherry-picked from the following upstream PRs:

- bitcoin/bitcoin#13659
- bitcoin/bitcoin#16110
